title: S17 Ep24: Riding With Ghosts, Angels, Aliens, & Spirits of the Dead w/John Russell
itunes:title: Riding With Ghosts, Angels, Aliens, & Spirits of the Dead w/John Russell
description:
Darkness Radio Presents: Riding With Ghosts, Angels, Aliens, & Spirits of the Dead with Psychic/medium/Author, John Russell!

John Russell joins Darkness Radio to tell his tale of discovering his gift at an extremely early age after being confronted by a strange visitor, having his life saved out on the highway on his motorcycle by his guardian angel, how he confirmed historical evidence in the assassination case of President Abraham Lincoln with his psychic gifts for a TV pilot, and where he stands with Aliens!

Get John's two Books, "Riding with Ghosts, Angels and the Spirits of the Dead", and "A Knock in the Attic: True Ghost Stories & other Spine-chilling Paranormal Adventures" here: Â  https://atdaylong.tripod.com/index.html
